…Text                          (Tuesday, May 13, 2025)   House of Representatives, Committee on Energy and Commerce, Washington,                                    D.C.

The committee met, pursuant to call, at 10:37 a.m. in Room       2123, Rayburn House Office Building, Hon. Brett Guthrie       [chair of the committee] presiding.

Present: Representatives…

…of the Finance  Committee and actually get something done, but time is running out. I  know that we want to get something done, but this Finance Committee-- has the full committee met in open mark-up for 7 days of debating and  amending legislation, and that is what it takes to get our colleagues  in order.

I want us to understand what legislating really…
